ISABMutexBeforeInit Class Reference

Private Attributes

  • pthread_mutex_t m_mutex
    This class is implemented with pthreads since JTC makes no guarantees about behaviour before JTCInitialize has been constructed.

Detailed Description

A mutex which can be used before ISABThreadInitialize is instatiated.

This mutex is NOT recursive.

This class should be obsolete when changing to a thread library better than JTC.

Member Function Documentation

void ISABMutexBeforeInit::lock (   ) 
 

Locks the mutex.

If the mutex is already locked, the calling thread blocks until the mutex is unlocked.

void ISABMutexBeforeInit::unlock (   ) 
 

Unlocks the mutex.

This function is called by the owner of the mutex's lock to release it.

Member Data Documentation

pthread_mutex_t ISABMutexBeforeInit::m_mutex [private]
 

This class is implemented with pthreads since JTC makes no guarantees about behaviour before JTCInitialize has been constructed.
